response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $10,000 to us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Given its worth to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your requirements. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure a top-tier solution at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our premium product.", "product_price": 9500}
